item.title: Math Blogging
item.description: A few cute derivations to test math blogging with Hugo. Binomial Limit to Poisson A basic fact about Binomial distributions is that they can be approximated by the Poisson distribution in a certain limit. As is often the case in probability, you can show this with generating functions. Here, however, we will show the pointwise limit of distributions. First, let us recall a few definitions.
